contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Station | name= Dallas Zoo | type= [[Dallas Area Rapid Transit|DART]] [[light rail]] station | image=DallasZooStn2.jpg|thumb| | image_size= | image_caption= | address=614 South Ewing Avenue<br />Dallas, Texas 75204 | coordinates={{Coord|32|44|26|N|96|48|47|W|type:railwaystation_region:US-OH|display=inline,title}} | line={{rail color box|system=DART|line=Red}} | other= DART Routes {{DART LB|19}}, {{DART RFB|515}} (M-Sat), and {{DART RFB|522}} (M-Sat) | platform=Two [[side platforms]] | parking=Two lockers, one rack | bicycle= | passengers= | pass_year= | pass_percent= | opened= June 14, 1996<ref name="June 15, 1996">{{cite news |first=Curtis|last=Howell |coauthors=Mark Wrolstad |work=The Dallas Morning News |title=Now Boarding: Rail debut has crowds lining up |date=June 15, 1996}}</ref> | rebuilt= | ADA=Yes | code= | owned= [[Dallas Area Rapid Transit]] | zone= | services= {{S-rail|title=DART}} {{S-line|system=DART|line=Red|previous=Tyler/Vernon|next=8th & Corinth}} }} '''Dallas Zoo''' is a [[DART Light Rail]] station located in the [[Oak Cliff]] neighborhood of [[Dallas, Texas|Dallas]], [[Texas]] ([[United States|USA]]) at Ewing Avenue and Clarendon Drive. It opened on June 14, 1996 and is a station on the {{DART R}}, serving the [[Dallas Zoo]] and Methodist Hospital. == References == {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.dart.org/riding/stations/dallaszoostation.asp DART - Dallas Zoo Station] {{Portal|Dallas-Fort Worth}} {{Dallas Area Rapid Transit}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Dallas Zoo (Dart Station)}} [[Category:Dallas Area Rapid Transit light rail stations]] [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1996]] {{Tram-stub}}
